scripts.maintenance:dev: mkdir -p dist && cp ../maintenance/index.html ./dist && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://dev.cabi --profile=CABI && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --profile=CABI --distribution-id EWPTW52IH5L5C --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://dev.cabi --profile=CABI && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --profile=CABI --distribution-id EWPTW52IH5L5C --paths '/*'
scripts.maintenance:main: mkdir -p dist && cp ../maintenance/index.html ./dist && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://cabi --profile=CABI && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --profile=CABI --distribution-id E12WMB9HCNB1DT --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:main: npm run build && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://42cabi --profile=CABI && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --profile=CABI --distribution-id E12WMB9HCNB1DT --paths '/*'
